im:name.label: 鐵板神數-專業八字命理玄學測算

summary.label:
本程式
⊙採用八卦加則、元會運世（皇極）、流年等三種取數方法
⊙基於傳統的12000鐵板條文
⊙內建老黃曆擇吉、萬年曆農曆查詢，今日宜忌、神煞方位、值日星神、時辰吉凶、九宮飛星、風水方位，一目瞭然！
⊙整理收錄相關知識，方便學習，基礎知識演算法無保留全公開！

鐵版神數簡介

鐵版神數，坊間又作「鐵板神數」，是一種根據「八字」，通過一系列複雜的推算法來預算命運的方法。鐵版神數始於何時已無從稽考了，但它的興起與流行者卻是在清代乾隆、嘉慶年間，至令也有二百多年歷史了。鐵板神數歷來被認爲是最高境界的算命術，非七政四餘、紫薇斗數、子平八字所能望其項背。相傳鐵板神數大師僅靠算盤撥算幾下，便可盡泄天機，尤其是"六親"生肖，一一道來，應驗無誤，其準確率令人咋舌稱歎。倪匡先生對此推命術十分推崇，在衛斯裏系列的「天書」「靈界」都有提到。

「鐵板神數」所依據的，是一部宋朝邵康節先生留下來的著作《皇極經世》，幾乎所有人的一生命運遭遇，全在這部書中。《皇極經世》一書是一部可與《周易》相媲美的巨著，目前廣泛流傳的《梅花易數》據說也是邵雍所作。邵雍師承李之才，李之才師承陳摶，陳摶在民間是一位神龍見首不見尾的傳奇人物。

似乎比較多的人，都認為鐵板神數跟四柱、奇門、六壬等一樣，是一門雖以易經為基礎，但基本上獨立的一門預測學。而實際上，鐵板神數絕非單獨的一門術數，它的綜合性是非常強的，要學好鐵板神數，你必須先精通四柱、納甲、紫薇鬥數等，這是入門之基礎，四柱、紫薇與常用的沒什麼兩樣，納甲起命卦用的是陳希夷元堂卦式。然後，才可以配以鐵板數的獨特法訣。

鐵板神數算命僅有四柱時辰是不夠的，它還把每個時辰分為八刻，每刻又分為十五分，這就是讓世人稱歎的「考時考刻」。但這又是最容易讓人誤解的，因為這刻分並非時鐘上的刻分，你即使把出生時辰精確到秒，也還可能是錯的，這刻分用的是「卦氣」。所以要用鐵板神數算准一個人的命運，須此人當面考對刻分才行，刻分定準後，一生命運方能準確無誤。

ToolKit can calculate Flight Duty and Extended Flight Duty Periods by use of inflight relief and Commander Discretion for given start times and acclimatised statuses for the various types of operations.

The eHOT calc will allow you to determine and calculate the end of the minimum and maximum holdover time for various de-icing fluids. It will also present a visual countdown timer.

The ZFW change / Extra fuel calc will allow you to determine final fuel taking into account ZFW change, change of alternate and/or extra holding required.

Fuel Calc can be used to determine the change in cargo and fuel weights from flight plan figures to make either a RTOW, ZFW or Landing weight limit.

The logbook tool will allow you to:
- Enter flight details
- Search for flight details
- Edit flight details
- Report on various parameters
- Send logbook data via email

The Cross Wind calc can be used to determine cross wind and head/tail wind values for a given runway and wind direction/speed along with the maximum wind strength from the set wind direction for a given cross wind limit (e.g. JFO limit).

The SMS RTOW tool allows you to easily configure the text message required to receive an SMS RTOW. This method will be easier and quicker then trying to amend a previous text you may have stored in your Messages.

The Runway State decoder can be used to quickly decode weather reports that may contain the standard 8-digit code. This can be useful for Moscow flights etc.

The SNOWTAM tool will provide assistance in decoding standard SNOWTAMs and will decode Japanese SNOWTAMs. 

The Meteorological Decode tool that will allow you to quickly decode significant present and forecast weather codes (i.e. +TSRA).

The Overnight Allowance calc allows you to easily check that the allowances you receive at check in. It will not tell you how much you will receive but it will tell you how many breakfast, lunch, dinner etc allowances you are entitled to.

The Last Pushback Time calc will calculate the required pushback time to allow you to achieve an on-blocks time inside your max FDP time taking into consideration sector time and taxi times. You will also be able to set a Notification to alert you that you have passed the Last Pushback Time.

The DG tool decodes DG codes and show loading restrictions and segregration requirements for specific DG as requested along with Lithium battery restrictions. 

The Low Temperature Altimetry calc can be used to determine altitude corrections for MSA and approaches conducted in low temperatures.

The MEL Rectification calc will provide the expiry date for a deferred defect given the DD entry date and the rectification interval category.

summary.label:
Revised Chinese Union Version

The Chinese Union Version (CUV) Bible, which was first published in 1919, is read by almost every Chinese Christian in the world and is treated as the “standard version” since its publication. However, the Chinese language has undergone tremendous changes over the past decades. Some terms used in the CUV Bible may not be familiar to today’s readers as such terms have even taken on different meanings. The revision of the CUV is based on current Chinese language usage and new insights from Biblical studies. The Revised Chinese Union Version (RCUV) is a rejuvenation of a century-old classic, keeping revisions to a minimum and maintaining the original style of the beloved CUV. The revision project took almost 30 years to complete, and involved the participation of over 30 Bible scholars from around the world. The launch of RCUV Bible hopes to enable Chinese readers to have a better understanding of God’s Word.

Please visit www.hkbs.org.hk to learn more about the RCUV.  You are also invited to donate to Hong Kong Bible Society so that we can make Scriptures available at a price that people can afford and in a language they can understand.

《康熙字典》是一部成書於清朝康熙五十五年(1716年)的漢語辭典,於康熙年間由文華殿大學士兼戶部尚書張玉書及經篩講官、文淵閣大學士兼吏部尚書陳廷敬擔任主編,參考明代的《字彙》、《正字通》兩書而寫,重印至今不輟。字義下列有該字的不同音切和意義,除僻字僻義外都引錄書證。清代法律規定,凡讀書人策應科舉考試,書寫字體必須以《康熙字典》為標準,因此,該書對學術界影響很大,成書之後,流行極廣,至今仍不失為一本有價值的語文工具書。(摘自 維基百科)

summary.label:
提供姓名學專用字庫 27484 個字,字庫包含了:文字部首、康熙筆劃、手寫筆劃、漢語拼音、注音、繁簡中文、男女用字、文字五行、納音五行...等資訊,及豐富的搜尋條件,可完全自己掌握文字篩選條件,是任何姓名學派別都適用的「取名/改名」最佳輔助工具。

功能說明:

》 搜尋:

可自訂「文字篩選」條件:

文字使用:
●女用字:女性慣用文字。
●男用字:男性慣用文字。
●名字用字:男女慣用文字。
●全部文字:包含 27484 個中文字。

繁簡字體:
●繁簡都用:當在繁體或簡體裡找不到時,請使用這項,因為繁簡某些字,互為簡繁。
●只用繁體:只顯示「繁體」字。
●只用簡體:只顯示「簡體」字。

筆劃使用:
●康熙筆劃:搜尋康熙筆劃數。
●手寫筆劃:搜尋手寫筆劃數。

筆劃範圍:
●可指定由幾劃找到幾劃的範圍。

文字五行:
●文字五行:文字字體之五行。
●納音五行:文字納音以國語發音之五行。
●未勾選時,代表搜尋所有五行。

拼音篩選:
●可輸入「漢語拼音」或「注音符號」來篩選同音字,如改名想換字不想換讀音,則可運用此功能來篩選。
●可同時輸入多個「漢語拼音」或「注音符號」,並以空格隔開,例:「lin」,即可找出與這二個音相同的中文字。

部首勾選:
●只搜尋有勾選的部首,可複選。
●未勾選時,代表搜尋所有部首。

》 搜尋完成:

找到文字後,按右上角「剪貼簿」將文字以筆劃做分類,存到剪貼簿內,可自行再用運,如:發送電子郵件、貼入備忘錄內...等。

》 偏好設定:

開啟後自動進入搜尋:可設定開啟後是否要自動進入搜尋功能。

*操作介面:繁體中文、簡體中文。
*同時支援 iPad 大螢幕任意方向顯示。

Here's what's new in version 6:

1) Complete support for iOS 13 and iPhone 11. We got you covered and release regular updates.

2) Clouds and Astronomy. Two words that rarely go together. Rewritten from the ground up, SkySafari 6 Plus will (optionally) back up all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

3) We Have The Best Stars. Precise, modern and deep. We’ve updated our star catalog to use the latest and greatest, UCAC5 star catalog.

4) Observers First. A redesign of our tools puts the active observer first. Quick access to features like your equipment, observing sites, lists, and observations make it easy and enjoyable to get out, observe, and record your observations.

5) Graph It. The completely new graph tool will give a quick visual representation of an object’s altitude above the horizon. Essential for planning your night’s observations.

6) Plan It. Make the most of your time under the stars. Our updated planner is a powerful tool that lets you create a list of targets for your observing session with filters like object types, specific time ranges, constellation, catalog, and more. Plan it and get more done.

7) Say It. Ever just wanted to just yell at your device and tell it what to do!? SkySafari 6 adds basic voice control for a wide range of operations. Say “select Jupiter,” “search for Titan,” “center on Polaris” and SkySafari will do the work for you. Yelling optional. 

8) Tilt It. Every old astronomy app these days lets your tilt and pan your device to show different parts of the sky, but who else lets you control your telescope that way!? “Tilt to slew” is an optional mode allowing you to keep your eye in the eyepiece, and, using the accelerometers in your device, gently translate the movements of your hands into smooth telescope motion.

9) Share It. SkySafari 6 is more than just a mobile app, it’s a new system to help organize and share your observing experiences. With a free signup, you can see and share your observing data from our web portal, LiveSky.com! • Learn the history, mythology, and science of astronomy! Browse over 1500 object descriptions and astronomical images. Explore NASA space missions! Stay up-to-date with SkyWeek for all major sky events every day!
